column4: hello I have question..I am using ubuntu 9..and my Hd is cut in two partition..one is home folder and file system which is almost 1 tb...is it possiblem to partition the file system so I could have another partiton let say 500GB because i want to install on that partition windows xp
you want to partition you first partition of 1tb into 500 and 500 ?
cause the 1 Tb i have I dont use it because its ubuntu file system installed...and i want to take away some GB of it because I want to install windows xp
u understand what I am trying to do?
